text:
I am not able to LOGIN into the application while Recording . When using Implementation as HTTPCLIENT 4 in HTTP Script Recorder Present under WorkBench . 


I am able to LOGIN Successfully into the application while Recording when i Select HTTPCLIENT 3.1 & JAVA .
